content:
Next Level Apparel was founded by Joe Simsoly in 2003. Simsoly had previously worked in the apparel industry, and he identified a gap in the market for high-quality, fashion-forward clothing that was also affordable. He saw an opportunity to create a brand that would appeal to a wide range of customers, from casual consumers to boutique retailers.

Simsoly started Next Level Apparel with a small team of experienced professionals, and the company quickly gained a reputation for producing high-quality garments at affordable prices. One of the key factors that set Next Level Apparel apart from its competitors was its focus on using premium fabrics and innovative manufacturing techniques to create garments that were not only stylish but also comfortable and durable.

The company's first product line consisted of basic t-shirts and tank tops, but it quickly expanded to include a wide range of clothing items for men, women, and children. Today, Next Level Apparel is a leading clothing brand that is recognized for its high-quality products and innovative designs, and it has a global network of distributors and retailers.
